mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, NAME, ID, PWD, EMAIL, NICK, TEL, AGE, DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{nick}, #{tel}, #{age},'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ID = #{id}, PWD = #{pwd}, EMAIL = #{email}, NICK = #{nick}, TEL = #{tel} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME, M.NICK , M.EMAIL, M.PWD, M.TEL, A.ADDRESS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ADDRESS A ON A.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
